description:
Dead Reckoning is a tool for kayakers, river rafters, fishermen, or any river rat enthusiasist. Very simply put, it retrieves all available data reported by the USGS from over 11,000 sites across the United States as well as a few additional territories. Capable of measuring over 150 different parameters, it is the ultimate app for checking America's waterways on the go with your webOS device. Collection sites can be added to your favorites from the preference section where new runs can be found by browsing through a particular state/province. 

The Pro version of this app adds several features making usage a whole lot easier. Please feel free to email with any comments & suggestions or leave a review in the App Catalog. 10% of all proceeds will be donated to webOS Internals for their support and assistance to the homebrew community. Open Source FTW!
